BuyInsurance.discount-info: If you have contents insurance, you get a 50% discount on mobile insurance purchased in the app!
BuyInsurance.pet-insurance-info: Get help quickly from local clinics with Tillit Pet Insurance.
BuyInsurance.pet-insurance-intro: We love our furry friends, and work really hard to create the world's best pet insurance. The cost of caring for your pet should never be a concern.
